portrait.alt: Merchant Lyra smiling behind her counter

message:
Welcome to my shop! I'm Lyra, and I've been trading with the Academy for years.

I buy the items you craft and sell them to travelers passing through. The better the quality, the more gold I can offer!

Use the profit margin slider to control your pricing. Higher margins mean more gold per sale, but items will take longer to sell. Find the sweet spot!
